org.point85.workschedule

Class Shift

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.point85.workschedule.Shift

  • public class Shift
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Shift is a scheduled working time period, and can include breaks.

    • Method Summary

      • calculateWorkingTime

        public java.time.Duration calculateWorkingTime(java.time.LocalTime from,
                                               java.time.LocalTime to)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculate the working time between the specified times of day. The shift must not span midnight.
        Parameters:
        from - starting time
        to - Ending time
        Returns:
        Duration of working time
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception

      • spansMidnight

        public boolean spansMidnight()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Check to see if this shift crosses midnight
        Returns:
        True if the shift extends over midnight, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception

      • calculateWorkingTime

        public java.time.Duration calculateWorkingTime(java.time.LocalTime from,
                                               java.time.LocalTime to,
                                               boolean beforeMidnight)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculate the working time between the specified times of day
        Parameters:
        from - starting time
        to - Ending time
        beforeMidnight - If true, and a shift spans midnight, calculate the time before midnight. Otherwise calculate the time after midnight.
        Returns:
        Duration of working time
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception
